DOC.brief_summary: The purpose observational , non-controlled , multicenter trial retrospective design evaluate visual performance one cohort patient receive multifocal intraocular lens ( MIOL ) MINI WELL® follow refractive lens exchange ( RLE ) cataract surgery . Primary outcome : Uncorrected Distance Visual Acuity , Best Corrected Visual Acuity , Best Corrected Near Visual Acuity , onset halo glare ( night vision ) . It also evaluate : Distance-Corrected Contrast sensitivity without glare , read speed best correction distance , Defocus Curve photopic condition . ADE/SADE/USADE AE/SAE secondary outcome .
DOC.brief_title: The Visual Performances Progressive Multifocal Intraocular Lens With Extended Depth Focus
DOC.detailed_description: In order obtain presbyopia-correcting IOL continuous range vision , SIFI MedTech ( Catania , Italy ) recently develop Mini WELL® , preloaded progressive multifocal aspheric IOL , optical design increase depth focus generate continuum focus . The vitro optical quality lens assess show large defocus tolerance near distance vision ( comparison diffractive lens ) well optical quality far vision 4.5 mm aperture diffractive , trifocal lens . Mini WELL® grant CE-mark use March 2014 , quickly gain please evaluation ophthalmology congress . On June 2015 , verify publication Mini WELL® clinical performance yet available , four Italian Investigators decide collaborate retrospectively study . The collected sample fully representative Italian population , consider total number MINI WELL® deliver Italy ( 150 lens August 2015 ) range involve side ( University Department , Ophthalmology Research Institute , Public Hospital Private Clinics ) . The primary objective trial evaluate retrospectively visual performance MINI WELL® qualitative quantitative term progressive vision . The collected variable : Uncorrected distance Visual Acuity ( UCVA ) , Best Corrected Visual Acuity ( BCVA ) , Best Corrected Near Visual Acuity ( BCNVA ) , onset halo , onset glare night vision . In addition , also evaluate : Monocular Distance-Corrected Contrast sensitivity without glare , Monocular binocular read speed best correction distance Monocular Defocus Curve photopic condition . The secondary outcome : ADE/SADE/USADE AE/SAE . The cohort subject include patient submit five involved Centers surgical procedure cataract extraction Refractive Lens Exchange ( RLE ) use MINI WELL® pre-operative visit ( day - 30 day -2 surgery ) post-operative follow visit perform 30 day implant ( window - 14 + 28 day ) . The period observation March 1st , 2014 March , 31st , 2016 , Data Collection period April , 30th , 2016 July , 31st , 2016
DOC.criteria: Any gender age 18 year Refractive lens exchange ( RLE ) cataract surgery Symmetrical preoperative keratometric astigmatism < 0.75 D Healthy cornea , treat surgically Previous corneal surgery ( i.e . pterygium , refractive surgery ) Eye diseases visual acuity < 20/32 Pseudoexfoliation Abnormal pupil size position . Use contact lens 30 day preoperative visit . Corneal warpage
